title: Boyden Italy Expands
text:
MILAN, Feb. 27, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Boyden , a premier leadership and talent advisory firm with more than 65 offices in over 40 countries, today announced that Michele Marchesan , a veteran human resources executive, has joined the firm as a Principal in its Milan office.
Michele Marchesan, a top global HR executive, has joined Boyden Italy.
“We are delighted Michele has joined Boyden,” said Anders Lindholm , Managing Partner of Boyden Italy and EMEA Leader of the firm’s Social Impact Practice. "Michele's deep experience in the industrial and technology sectors, where he has led cross-cultural recruiting assignments, brings valuable high-level experience to the firm and immediately makes him an outstanding addition to our team.”
In his 30-year career, Marchesan has overseen numerous searches for C-suite and senior level management throughout Europe, Asia and the U.S.
Previously, Marchesan served as Senior Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer at Datalogic , a global technology company based in Bologna, where he recruited the COO, CFO, CIO and General Counsel. Earlier in his career, he was a Senior Vice President for HR Global Operations, Major Appliances and Head of Group Industrial Relations at AB Electrolux .
Marchesan holds a master’s degree in political science from the University of Perugia. He is fluent in Italian, English and French.
About Boyden
Boyden is a premier leadership and talent advisory firm with more than 65 offices in over 40 countries. Our global reach enables us to serve client needs anywhere they conduct business. We connect great companies with great leaders through executive search, interim management and leadership consulting solutions. For further information, visit www.boyden.com.
